message.content:
cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.SY, cs.IT, cs.MA 

Reasoning: The paper discusses reinforcement learning algorithms, specifically Q-learning and policy gradients, which are commonly studied in the machine learning and artificial intelligence communities. The use of softmax relaxation and entropic regularization also suggests a focus on optimization and information theory, which are relevant to the sub-categories of cs.IT and cs.MA. The paper's title and abstract mention the equivalence between policy gradients and soft Q-learning, which is a topic of interest in the sub-category of cs.LG (Machine Learning). Finally, the use of convex analysis and policy inequality suggests a focus on control and optimization, which are relevant to the sub-category of cs.SY (Systems and Control).
